rooms.description: Spacious entrance with traditional Chettinad motifs and decorative arches.
Open-plan living area integrating dining space with modern furniture, large windows for ample natural light adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Functional kitchen designed in Chettinad style, ensuring proper ventilation and placement as per Vastu for auspicious energy flow.
Larger bedroom with built-in storage and a private balcony facing the garden; positioned in north-east corner following Vastu recommendations.
Separate guest room with comfortable seating area; placed adjacent to master bedroom ensuring harmonious energy distribution.
Cozy study area equipped for remote work or personal projects, designed in line with Chettinad aesthetics and Vastu orientation.
